mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (product_id, name, category, price, weight, sold_amount, stock_amount, description, image_path, choice, specification) VALUES (#{productId}, #{name}, #{category}, #{price}, #{weight}, #{soldAmount}, #{stockAmount}, #{description}, #{imagePath}, #{choice}, #{specification})
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET name = #{name}, category = #{category}, price = #{price}, weight = #{weight}, sold_amount = #{soldAmount}, stock_amount = #{stockAmount}, description = #{description}, image_path = #{imagePath}, choice = #{choice}, specification = #{specification} WHERE product_id = #{productId}
UPDATE products SET stock_amount = #{newStock} WHERE product_id = #{productId}
UPDATE products SET sold_amount = #{soldAmount} WHERE product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
